Detailed Description

Functions to confiure to nanoLOC transceiver modes.

Date:
2007-Dez-4
Author:
S.Radtke, O.Tekyar (C) 2007 Nanotron Technologies
Note:
BuildNumber = "BuildNumber : 7951";

This file contains source code for the IQ matrix values used to generate the chirp seqences.

Function Documentation

void NTRXSetAgcValues ( uint8_t  bandwidth,
uint8_t  symbolDur,
uint8_t  symbolRate 
)

Initializing the AGC values.

Parameters:
bandwidth this parameter determines the the mode (fdma or 80 MHz)
symbolDur this parameter determines the symbol duration between 500ns and 8us)
symbolRate this parameter determines the symbol rate between 125kbit and 2Mbit)
This function initializes the agc values for a specific mode.

symbolDur this parameter determines the symbol duration between 500ns and 8us)
This function initializes the correlator threshold registers for a specific mode.

uint8_t  symbolDur 
)

Initializing of iq parameter for the receiver.

Parameters:
bandwidth this parameter determines the the mode (fdma or 80 MHz)
symbolDur this parameter determines the symbol duration between 500ns and 8us)
This function initializes the iq parameter for the receiver depending on the bandwidth and symbol duration.
